Fairmont Hot Springs is a small unincorporated community of 476. It is best known for its natural hot springs and three golf courses as well as a small, family orientated ski hill.
Fairmont Hot Springs is accessed by car 26km south of Invermere on highway 95 towards Cranbrook.
A few minutes South of Fairmont Hot Springs along side the highway 95 is the hoodoos. The hoodoos can also be viewed from the top of Fairmont ski hill.
